AzureBlade was hit hard this time. He went in stasis lock before he 
could do anything.

Yggdrasil had been monitoring the battle and gasped as Azureblade was 
displayed in stasis lock.

Yggdrasil: Rodimus, Azure is down. Whatever that thing is, it's got 
to be destroyed NOW! Maybe that Tripred diplomat could help... 
Anyways, I can't find it's weak point, so do your best to find it.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime/Kup/Lunekill : :
> 
> Lunekill stalks over to where Azure had fallen from her strike.
> 
> Lunekill: Pathetic creature!
> 
> She fires a fusion blast down at him.
> 
> Meanwhile Kup unleashes three shots at Rockseeker.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Kup, any ideas?
> 
> Kup: Can't say I have, Roddy. I've never seen anyone like these 
two...
> 
> 
> Proudwing500k@h... wrote:
> Rockseeker finally succeeded at melting his ice prison. The thing 
he 
> does is grab his Radiant pistol and fire a radioactive blast at 
> Dragos.
> 
> Lunekill was in range. She unleashed the three fusion rays at the 
> Maximals base. The shields, already damaged by Rockseeker's 
kamikaze 
> attack, were further reduced to a total power of 15%.
> 
> AzureBlade barely had time to avoid the blasts . He transformed to 
> jet mode and went straight to the hude station that Lunekill was. 
She 
> was already charging her cannons for a second attack, but she never 
> saw the attack coming.
> 
> The Maximal dragon-jet fired in the central cannon. The charge in 
it 
> blew up and ripped the cannon to splinters. However, the counter-
> attack took him out of the sky and he fell like a brick to the 
ground.
> 
> Inside the base, Yggdrasil tried to coordinate the attacks. There 
> were only two attackers, but he couldn't even realize how 
persistent 
> they were.
> 
> Yggdrasil: All units, Azureblade has been hit. The frozen one is 
back 
> in the fray, and the shields won't hold out much longer. No 
quarters! 
> Kill them before you consider making them prisoners!
> 
> He began to ask himself who these guys were...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > Surestrike: Looks at Denzabar and then at his friends "I'll stay 
> here with Denzabar and help him out."
> >  
> > Dragos: Nods and tells the others " Lets get back out there and 
> Fight."
> > As the rest of them heads back outside to engage in the defense 
of 
> the Maximal Base.
> >  
> > SureStrike: Looking at Denzabar " Okay time for a crash Course," 
As 
> he starts to teach Denzabar the ropes.
> > 
> > Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> > "Comm-mun-ic-ations?
> > Denzabarrepeated. He has only been with any bots for three days, 
he 
> has spent three years with other neandrthals.
